name: Red Mantle
description:
Explore a desolate space station, piece together the story of its past, and defeat powerful enemies for a better future!

Red Mantle: 5 Aug 2022 Release Trailer - Indie DB
  • Collect weapons, items, armor, and gear: Master a diverse arsenal of weapons, items, and gear and protect yourself with a variety of armor sets.
  • Face a variety of enemies: Face against a variety of enemies, each with different weapons, armor, and items. Discover and overcome challenging boss fights!
  • Immerse yourself with a custom character: Customize your character to your liking at the start of the game and modify your character freely at any Cloning Center on the station.
  • Customize your play: Loot quality, combat difficulty, and currency value can all be adjusted by in-game sliders to tailor your gameplay experience. Provide additional challenge, or tear through the station as an unstoppable super soldier!
Character Customization - Indie DB
